[[ZDoom]] allows to set [[monster]]s on '''patrol paths''', where they move on their own without having to first be "woken up" by seeing a [[player]].
Patrol paths are created with {{Class|PatrolPoint}}s and, optionally, {{Class|PatrolSpecial}}s. Monsters are placed on a patrol path with the [[Thing_SetGoal]] special.
